A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A-\, not the best star wars yet\, and maybe not as great as a TWA\, but better than the prequel trilogy\, and a great addition\, a lot of humor\, a lot of great twist. A good movie in the beginning\, slow in the middle with a few plot lines and characters that could have been left out\, some plots from the TWA that basically got nerfed\, unless they get un-nerfed by JJ in 9\, and then a great!!! movie in the second half. Two or three truly WTF moments. I saw it twice already\, and will definitely see again.
